psppsgva.description: Political system allows people to have a say in what government does
psppsgva.question: How much would you say the political system in [country] allows people like you to have a say in what the government does?

actrolga.description: Able to take active role in political group
actrolga.question: How able do you think you are to take an active role in a group involved with political issues?

psppipla.description: Political system allows people to have influence on politics
psppipla.question: And how much would you say that the political system in [country] allows people like you to have an influence on politics?

cptppola.description: Confident in own ability to participate in politics
cptppola.question: And how confident are you in your own ability to participate in politics?

trstprl.question: Using this card, please tell me on a score of 0-10 how much you personally trust each of the institutions I read out. 0 means you do not trust an institution at all, and 10 means you have complete trust. Firstly... ...[country]'s parliament?

trstlgl.question: Using this card, please tell me on a score of 0-10 how much you personally trust each of the institutions I read out. 0 means you do not trust an institution at all, and 10 means you have complete trust. Firstly... ...the legal system?

trstsci.question: Using this card, please tell me on a score of 0-10 how much you personally trust each of the institutions I read out. 0 means you do not trust an institution at all, and 10 means you have complete trust. Firstly... ..scientists?

vote.question: Some people don't vote nowadays for one reason or another. Did you vote in the last [country] national election in [month/year]?

donprty.question: During the last 12 months, have you... ...donated to or participated in a political party or pressure group?

pstplonl.description: Posted or shared anything about politics online last 12 months

volunfp.description: Volunteered for not-for-profit or charitable organisation
volunfp.question: During the last 12 months, have you... ...volunteered for a not-for-profit or charitable organisation?

lrscale.question: In politics people sometimes talk of 'left' and 'right'. Using this card, where would you place yourself on this scale, where 0 means the left and 10 means the right?

stflife.description: How satisfied with life as a whole
stflife.question: All things considered, how satisfied are you with your life as a whole nowadays? Please answer using this card, where 0 means extremely dissatisfied and 10 means extremely satisfied.

stfeco.description: How satisfied with present state of economy in country
stfeco.question: On the whole how satisfied are you with the present state of the economy in [country]?

stfgov.description: How satisfied with the national government
stfgov.question: Now thinking about the [country] government, how satisfied are you with the way it is doing its job?

stfdem.description: How satisfied with the way democracy works in country
stfdem.question: And on the whole, how satisfied are you with the way democracy works in [country]?

stfedu.description: State of education in country nowadays
stfedu.question: Now, using this card, please say what you think overall about the state of education in [country] nowadays?

stfhlth.description: State of health services in country nowadays
stfhlth.question: Still using this card, please say what you think overall about the state of health services in [country] nowadays?

gincdif.description: Government should reduce differences in income levels
gincdif.question: Using this card, please say to what extent you agree or disagree with each of the following statements. The government should take measures to reduce differences in income levels.

freehms.description: Gays and lesbians free to live life as they wish
freehms.question: Using this card, please say to what extent you agree or disagree with each of the following statements. Gay men and lesbians should be free to live their own life as they wish.

hmsfmlsh.description: Ashamed if close family member gay or lesbian
hmsfmlsh.question: Using this card, please say to what extent you agree or disagree with each of the following statements. If a close family member was a gay man or a lesbian, I would feel ashamed.

hmsacld.description: Gay and lesbian couples right to adopt children
hmsacld.question: Using this card, please say to what extent you agree or disagree with each of the following statements. Gay male and lesbian couples should have the same rights to adopt children as straight couples.

euftf.description: European Union: European unification go further or gone too far
euftf.question: Now thinking about the European Union, some say European unification should go further. Others say it has already gone too far. Using this card, what number on the scale best describes your position?

lrnobed.description: Obedience and respect for authority most important virtues children should learn
lrnobed.question: Using this card, please say to what extent you agree or disagree with each of the following statements. Obedience and respect for authority are the most important values children should learn.

loylead.description: Country needs most loyalty towards its leaders
loylead.question: Using this card, please say to what extent you agree or disagree with each of the following statements. What [country] needs most is loyalty towards its leaders.

imsmetn.description: Allow many/few immigrants of same race/ethnic group as majority
imsmetn.question: Now, using this card, to what extent do you think [country] should allow people of the same race or ethnic group as most [country]'s people to come and live here?

values.1: Allow many to come and live here

imdfetn.description: Allow many/few immigrants of different race/ethnic group from majority
imdfetn.question: How about people of a different race or ethnic group from most [country] people?

values.1: Allow many to come and live here

impcntr.description: Allow many/few immigrants from poorer countries outside Europe
impcntr.question: How about people from the poorer countries outside Europe?

values.1: Allow many to come and live here

imbgeco.description: Immigration bad or good for country's economy
imbgeco.question: Would you say it is generally bad or good for [country]'s economy that people come to live here from other countries?

imueclt.description: Country's cultural life undermined or enriched by immigrants
imueclt.question: And, using this card, would you say that [country]'s cultural life is generally undermined or enriched by people coming to live here from other countries?

imwbcnt.description: Immigrants make country worse or better place to live
imwbcnt.question: Is [country] made a worse or a better place to live by people coming to live here from other countries?
